tool_description: Manages and maintains pools of reviewers, tracks their performance history, expertise evolution, and availability patterns for efficient future recruitment.

pool_name.description: Name identifier for the reviewer pool

action.description: Action to perform: create, update, analyze, export

reviewer_ids.description: List of reviewer identifiers for pool operations

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [create, update, analyze, export].
Pool name already exists: Choose a unique name for new pool creation.
Pool not found: The specified pool_name does not exist for update/analyze/export operations.
Invalid reviewer IDs: Some provided reviewer identifiers do not exist.
usage: Provide pool_name and action to manage reviewer pools. Include reviewer_ids when creating or updating pools. Use analyze to get pool statistics and export to retrieve pool data.

pool_size.description: Total number of reviewers in the pool

expertise_coverage.description: List of research areas covered by the pool

operation_summary.description: Summary of the performed operation and results
